Pronoun: How Many / Much / Heavy? Few? Seldom? Often? When?
Answer: Quantities, with Scale and a Zero Value.Differences and Ratios /Products are meaningful.
Example: Length,Height,Temperature in Kelvin,Activity,Dose Amount,Reaction Rate,Flow Rate,Concentration,Pulse,Survival Rate

Pronoun: How Many / Much / Heavy? Few? Seldom? Often? When?
Answer:
Quantities with Scale.
Differences are meaningful, but not products or ratios
Example: pH,SAT score(200-800),Credit score(300-850),SAT score(200-800),Year of Starting College

Answer: A Manner / Method, Type or Attribute from a list, with list items in some " order" ( e.g. good, better, improved, best..)
Example: Socioeconomic status (Low income, Middle income, High income),Education level (HighSchool, BS, MS, PhD),Satisfaction rating(Very much Dislike, Dislike, Neutral, Like, Very Much Like)
